title: ollama/ollama
summary: Lightweight, extensible framework for running large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, enabling Node and browser integrations.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, installable via PyPI and supporting sync/async APIs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, allowing LangChain apps to use locally-running Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with model management, chat history, and multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat sessions, prompt templates, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama-powered code completion and chat into the editor.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model inside a Discord server.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama, supporting threaded conversations and custom system prompts.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, monitoring, and reverse-proxy examples.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Retrieval-augmented generation demo using Ollama + ChromaDB for private document Q&A.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama published to Maven Central with Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama with NuGet package and examples.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE) module for CI pipelines that need to spin up Ollama containers for testing.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: Cross-platform desktop app combining Ollama backend with a polished GPT4All-style UI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting Ollama models act as generators or rankers in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service template that exposes additional authentication, rate-limiting, and model-proxy endpoints over Ollama.

title: ollama-chatbot-mac
summary: Native macOS SwiftUI app that wraps Ollama into a menu-bar chatbot with keyboard shortcuts.
